## Summary

This report surfaces the 7 most active emerging narratives in the Solana ecosystem as of February 2026, based on real-time on-chain data (Helius API), GitHub activity, and curated research signals. Each narrative includes a strength score, evidence, an explanation of *why* it's emerging now, and 3-5 concrete build ideas.

## ğŸš€ How to Run

```bash
git clone https://github.com/byte541/solana-narrative-radar.git
cd solana-narrative-radar

# Optional: Helius API key for live on-chain data (free at helius.dev)
export HELIUS_API_KEY=your_key_here

python3 main.py
```

Output in `./output/`: HTML dashboard, Markdown report, JSON data.
